name: Jumpin' Jab
description:
A fighting game that happens to be a platformer game. No punches, kicks or throws, just jumps. 

This is a game build entirely around Mario ‘combat system’. Turned out to be pretty fun, check it out!

A very rushed project, hope you like it!

This is local-multiplayer ONLY game.

Mac version is currently unavaliable, I'm working on fixing it.
